title: Venus in 4th House for Virgo Ascendant
summary: When Venus transits the 4th house for Virgo Ascendant, it enhances domestic comfort, emotional security, relationships at home, and appreciation for beauty in living spaces. This phase supports harmony with family members and a stronger desire for peace, stability, and refined surroundings. Matters related to home, property, vehicles, or education move smoothly with patience. Emotional expression becomes softer and more caring. However, attachment to comfort or avoidance of practical responsibilities should be moderated to maintain balance and long-term stability.
